00032 #define EXIT_FAILURE -1

00034 __u16 getUpperAddress(__u32 u32address){
00035    __u16 u16address;
00036    u16address = 0;
00037 
00038    u16address = u32address >> 16;
00039 
00040 return u16address;
00041 }

00044 
00045 __u16 getLowerAddress(__u32 u32address){
00046    __u16 u16address;
00047    u16address = 0;
00048 
00049    u16address = u32address;
00050 
00051 return u16address;
00052 }

00056 int getFileSize(char *path){
00057    unsigned long size;
00058    size_t filesize;
00059    struct stat statbuf;
00060    size = -1;
00061 
00062 
00063    if ((lstat(path, &statbuf)) == -1 ){
00064         perror("Pfadfehler");
00065         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00066    }
00067 
00068    //read the filesize
00069    //fstat(initconfig, &statbuf);
00070    filesize = statbuf.st_size;
00071    size = (int)filesize;
00072 
00073 return size;
00074 }

00078 int calculateStopAddress(int filesize, int startaddress){
00079    int stopaddress, result;
00080    __u32 u32rawdata;
00081 
00082    stopaddress = 0;
00083    result = 0;
00084 
00085    stopaddress = (startaddress + (filesize / 2) - 1);
00086    //printf("%#x\n", stopaddress);
00087 
00088    /* check if we have a buggy firmware, therefor change
00089       back to MsgBuf Mode first. */
00090    result = rcuBusControlCmd(eEnableMsgBuf);
00091    if(result < 0){
00092       printf("Error entering Msg Mode: %d\n", result);
00093    }
00094 
00095    result = rcuSingleRead(0xb102,&u32rawdata);
00096    if(result < 0){
00097         printf("Error during rcuSingleRead 0xb102: %d", result);
00098         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00099    }
00100 
00101    result = rcuBusControlCmd(eEnableFlash);
00102    if(result < 0){
00103       printf("Error entering Flash Mode: %d\n", result);
00104    }
00105 
00106    //correct the FW Error
00107    if(u32rawdata == 0xffff0102)
00108         stopaddress += 100;
00109 
00110 return stopaddress;
00111 }

00114 
00115 int enterFlashState(int oldstate){
00116    int result;
00117 
00118    switch(oldstate){
00119         case 2: //already in Flash State
00120                 break;
00121         case 1: //state was Selectmap
00122                 result = rcuBusControlCmd(eEnableMsgBuf);
00123                 if(result < 0){
00124                    printf("Error entering Msg Mode: %d\n", result);
00125                 }
00126 
00127         case 3:
00128                 //State was MsgBuf or SelectMap - switching to Flash
00129                 result = rcuBusControlCmd(eEnableFlash);
00130                 if(result < 0){
00131                    printf("Error entering Flash Mode: %d\n", result);
00132                 }
00133                 break;
00134         default:result = -1;
00135                 printf("Error during detection of Bus State - aborting\n");
00136                 break;
00137    }
00138 
00139 return result;
00140 }
00141 
00142 
00143 int getBusState(){
00144    int state, result;
00145    state = 0;
00146    result = 0;
00147 
00148    result = rcuBusControlCmd(eCheckSelectmap);
00149    if(result == 1)
00150         state = 1;
00151    result = 0;
00152    result = rcuBusControlCmd(eCheckFlash);
00153    if(result == 1)
00154         state = 2;
00155    result = 0;
00156    result = rcuBusControlCmd(eCheckMsgBuf);
00157    if(result == 1)
00158         state = 3;
00159    result = 0;
00160 
00161 return state;
00162 }
00163 
00164 
00165 int restoreBusState(int oldstate){
00166    int result;
00167    result = 0;
00168 
00169    switch(oldstate){
00170         case 2: // was already in Flash State
00171                 break;
00172         case 1:
00173                 //State was MsgBuf or SelectMap - switching to Flash
00174                 result = rcuBusControlCmd(eEnableMsgBuf);
00175                 if(result < 0){
00176                    printf("Error entering MsgBuf Mode: %d", result);
00177                 }
00178                 result = rcuBusControlCmd(eEnableSelectmap);
00179                 if(result < 0){
00180                    printf("Error entering Selectmap Mode: %d", result);
00181                 }
00182                 break;
00183         case 3:
00184                 //State was MsgBuf or SelectMap - switching to Flash
00185                 result = rcuBusControlCmd(eEnableMsgBuf);
00186                 //State was MsgBuf or SelectMap - switching to Flash
00187                 result = rcuBusControlCmd(eEnableMsgBuf);
00188                 if(result < 0){
00189                    printf("Error entering MsgBuf Mode: %d", result);
00190                 }
00191                 break;
00192         default:result = -1;
00193                 printf("Error while restoring original Bus state");
00194                 break;
00195    }
00196 return result;
00197 }

00200 int getFrameAddressFromLine(char line[255], int *pframeaddr){
00201    int block, major, minor;
00202 
00203    block = -1;
00204    major = -1;
00205    minor = -1;
00206 
00207    switch(line[0]){
00208         case '#'://sprintf(filename,"frame_%d_%d_%d.hex",block,major,minor);
00209                 break;
00210         case '\0':break;
00211         case '0':
00212         case '1':
00213         case '2':
00214         case '3':
00215                 block=charToInt(line[0]);
00216                 major=charToInt(line[2]);
00217                 switch(line[3]){
00218                         case ';':
00219                                 minor=charToInt(line[4]);
00220                                 if(line[5]!=';'){
00221                                         minor*=10;
00222                                         minor+=charToInt(line[5]);
00223                                         if(line[6]!=';'){
00224                                                 minor*=10;
00225                                                 minor+=charToInt(line[6]);
00226                                         }
00227                                 }
00228                                 break;
00229                         default:
00230                                 major*=10;
00231                                 major+=charToInt(line[3]);
00232                                 switch(line[4]){
00233                                         case ';':
00234                                                 minor=charToInt(line[5]);
00235                                                 if(line[6]!=';'){
00236                                                         minor*=10;
00237                                                         minor+=charToInt(line[6]);
00238                                                         if(line[7]!=';'){
00239                                                                 minor*=10;
00240                                                                 minor+=charToInt(line[7]);
00241                                                         }
00242                                                 }
00243                                                         break;
00244                                         default:
00245                                                 major*=10;
00246                                                 major+=charToInt(line[4]);
00247                                                 minor=charToInt(line[6]);
00248                                                 if(line[7]!=';'){
00249                                                         minor*=10;
00250                                                         minor+=charToInt(line[7]);
00251                                                         if(line[8]!=';'){
00252                                                                 minor*=10;
00253                                                                 minor+=charToInt(line[8]);
00254                                                         }
00255                                                 }
00256                                                 break;
00257                                 }
00258                                 break;
00259 
00260                         }
00261                // printf("processing ");
00262                // printf("Block %d,",block);
00263                // printf("Major %d,",major);
00264                // printf("Minor %d",minor);
00265                // printf("\n");
00266                 //sprintf(ReadbackRawFrameFilename,"frame%d.%d.%d.hex",block,major,minor);
00267                 //sprintf(ErrorFrameFilename,"Err_frame%d.%d.%d.hex",block,major,minor);
00268         *pframeaddr++ = block;
00269                 *pframeaddr++ = major;
00270                 *pframeaddr = minor;
00271 
00272                 break;
00273         default:break;
00274    }
00275 }

00278 // maybe stupid, but works for now
00279 int charToInt(char zeichen){
00280 int value;
00281    switch(zeichen){
00282         case '0':value=0;
00283                 break;
00284         case '1':value=1;
00285                 break;
00286         case '2':value=2;
00287                 break;
00288         case '3':value=3;
00289                 break;
00290         case '4':value=4;
00291                 break;
00292         case '5':value=5;
00293                 break;
00294         case '6':value=6;
00295                 break;
00296         case '7':value=7;
00297                 break;
00298         case '8':value=8;
00299                 break;
00300         case '9':value=9;
00301                 break;
00302         default:break;
00303    }
00304 return value;
00305 }

00308 int getLinesnumberFromFile(char *filename){
00309    int result;
00310    FILE *frames;
00311    char line[255];
00312    int *pData;
00313    int data[3];
00314    result = 0;
00315 
00316    //open frames.txt for reading
00317    if((frames=fopen(filename,"r")) < 0){
00318         printf("Could not open %s for reading!\n",filename);
00319         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00320    }
00321 
00322    //if there is something to readout
00323    while(fgets(line,255,frames)!=NULL){
00324         //read line from framesfile
00325         pData = &data[0];
00326         getFrameAddressFromLine(line, pData);
00327 
00328         if(data[0] != -1){
00329                 result++;
00330         }
00331    }
00332 
00333    fclose(frames);
00334 
00335 return result;
00336 }

00339 int getHexValueFromLine(char line[255], unsigned short *pframeaddress){
00340    int value;
00341    char shortline[4];
00342    //value = -1;
00343 
00344    if(strncmp(line,"#",1) == 0){
00345         //value = -1;
00346         //printf("found a comment\n");
00347    }
00348    else if(strncmp(line,"$frame_addr31_16",15) == 0){
00349     //printf("pframeaddress zeigt auf: %#x", *pframeaddress);
00350         //printf("found $frame_addr32_16\n");
00351         value=*pframeaddress;
00352 
00353         //printf("address31_16: %x\n",value);
00354    }
00355    else if(strncmp(line,"$frame_addr15_0",15) == 0){
00356         //printf("found $frame_addr15_0\n");
00357         value=*(pframeaddress+1);
00358     
00359         //printf("address15_0: %x\n",value);
00360    }
00361    else{
00362         strncpy(shortline,line,4);
00363         sscanf (shortline, "%x", &value);
00364         //printf("normal command: %x\n",value);
00365    }
00366 
00367 return value;
00368 }
